body.div:
Jolokia is remote JMX with JSON over HTTP.
It is fast, simple, polyglot and adds unique features. It's JMX on Capsaicin.
body.p: Jolokia is an agent based approach to remote JMX where an archive is deployed on the target platform. Various agents are available for different platforms covering all important setups. Jolokia can be operated in an agentless mode, too, where a proxy translates between the Jolokia JSON protocol and standarized JSR-160 JMX remote calls.

ul.li: Hot Features which makes Jolokia unique among JMX remoting solutions.
The Documentation includes a tutorial, a reference manual and the JSON protocol specification.
Agents are available for many platforms (JEE, OSGi, Mule, JDK6 JVM).
Client libraries include language bindings for Java and Perl.

section.name: News
section.subsection: Jolokia 0.80 is the initial release. It is the direct the successor of agent part from Jmx4Perl 0.71 with no additional features. Get it from the Download page and read the announcement in our blog.
